channel.title: Can somone help meeee i need help badly!(editing skills)
channel.description: People, I want to edit one of my skills (runecrafting, theiving, ETC.) so how would I FIND my skills? And how do I add skills? Like add runecrafting o my server. Like editing the thieving, smithing, fishing etc. Stuff like that. And like Is there a tut someonewhere that can teach me this? Also how do i delete objects?(hay bales) and edit exp for doors and dummys exp you get when you attack it. :confused: :confused: :confused: :confused: :confused: :confused: :| :| :| :eek: :eek: :eek: :eek:

item.title: Can somone help meeee i need help badly!(editing skills)
item.dc:creator: @bed240 bed240
item.description:
@bed240 wrote:

ask alot ay? lol answer to ur first question is all in client.java lets say for runecrafting u shud be able to find stuff like this

[code]case 7133: // nature rift
CraftRunesRift(“nature”, 60, 36500, 561, 10000+playerLevel[20], 30, 791);
break;

case 7132: // cosmic rift
CraftRunesRift(“cosmic”, 40, 25000, 564, 10000+playerLevel[20], 30, 791);
break;[/code]

ect…depending on how u runecraft on ur server u might use alters or something just search for the alter id.
same with theiving and fishing n stuff…
To add theese skills you can either code it youself or C+P off a tutorial.

delete objects if u can find in client.java you should have a list of objects just search for this

makeGlobalObject(

there should be loads of objects just find the id for ur hay and if its there then take it out if not i cnt rember how to do deleteobject might just be deleteGlobalObject im not sure
if not then find the coords for the hay and make an object over it.

to edit the exp for doors ect… find the id for the door(right click the door id at botom)
and search the id in client.java under it should be something like this

if (actionTimer == 0) { sendMessage("you gain attack exp."); setAnimation(0x326); addSkillXP((450*playerLevel[0]), 0); addSkillXP((450*playerLevel[3]), 3); actionTimer = 1; } break;

And were it says addskillXP((450* <— or what ever number urs is just change it and that will change the ammount of exp ect…

hope it helped you somehow

Read full topic
item.source: Can somone help meeee i need help badly!(editing skills)
